title: An Act authorizing the reorientation of the parcel of land occupied by Riverside Boat Club of Cambridge

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Connolly of Cambridge, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3308) of Mike Connolly relative to authorizing the commissioner of the Division of Capital Asset Management and Maintenance to reorient a certain parcel of land occupied by Riverside Boat Club of Cambridge.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 04/09/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on House Ways and Means
committee on House Ways and Means
